name: Redshift (itch) (Messicano, Tomtopo, Tooppa)
description:
WARNING! This game is not for the faint-hearted and is not very easy. Play at your own discretion!

CONTROLS - BASIC

  • Move: WASD
  • Jump: SPACE
  • Pause Menu: ESC
  • In-Game Menu: TAB
  • Point flashlight: MOUSE

CONTROLS - PICKABLE TOOLS

  • Rocket Boots: SHIFT
  • Force Glove: RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON
  • Gun: LEFT MOUSE BUTTON (Obtained automatically from spaceship)
  • Charged Shot: HOLD LEFT MOUSE BUTTON AND RELEASE
  • Switch between Flashlight and Gun: F
